version_description:
- fixed the crash when attempting to share a track
- added Last.FM scrobbling

Follow @gratefuldeadod and @alecgorge for updates or to ask questions!

- fixes a crash while scrolling through years
- improved gapless playback

- Complete redesign

- more reliable music streaming
- improved UI components

- more reliable downloads and offline listening

Relisten has been rewritten from the ground up for a more stable and reliable listening experience.

Shake to report bugs (or email us at ios@relisten.net)

Relisten has been rewritten from the ground up for a more stable and reliable listening experience.

Shake to report bugs (or email us at ios@relisten.net)

- Crash fixes
- Memory leak fixes

- Crash fixes
- Memory leak fixes

- Crash fixes
- More reliable importing
- Fix crash loop some people were experiencing

- Crash fixes
- More reliable importing
- Fix crash loop some people were experiencing

- Search! Most views have a search bar at the top (drag down to expose it)
- Improved app performance for users with large listening histories
- Listening history is saved instantly instead of at the halfway point of a track. (last.fm is still reported at the halfway point)
- Fixed a handful of common crashes

- Search! Most views have a search bar at the top (drag down to expose it)
- Improved app performance for users with large listening histories
- Listening history is saved instantly instead of at the halfway point of a track. (last.fm is still reported at the halfway point)
- Fixed a handful of common crashes

- The favorite artist section wasn't appearing on load until an artist was favorited.
- Fixed a crash that would occasionally happen when downloading tracks

- The favorite artist section wasn't appearing on load until an artist was favorited.
- Fixed a crash that would occasionally happen when downloading tracks
